name: Complete project proposal
description: Write and submit the quarterly project proposal with all required documentation

name: Review team performance
description: Analyze Q1 team metrics and prepare feedback for team members

name: Update documentation
description: Update project documentation with latest changes and improvements

name: Schedule team meeting
description: Organize and schedule the monthly team meeting with agenda

name: Prepare presentation
description: Create presentation slides for the upcoming client meeting

name: Code review
description: Review pull requests and provide feedback to development team

name: Update dependencies
description: Update project dependencies to latest stable versions

name: Fix critical bug
description: Investigate and fix the critical bug reported in production

name: Write unit tests
description: Add comprehensive unit tests for the new feature module

name: Design user interface
description: Create mockups and design the new user interface components

name: Deploy to staging
description: Deploy the latest version to staging environment for testing

name: Optimize database queries
description: Review and optimize slow database queries for better performance

name: Setup CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipeline

name: Security audit
description: Conduct security audit and fix any vulnerabilities found

name: Plan sprint
description: Plan tasks and priorities for the next development sprint
